getSelectedBaseChannel

protected Channel getSelectedBaseChannel(RequestContext rctx)
Return the selected base channel, either the existing value for a channel being edited, the previous selection on the form after an error, or the first value in the list.

Parameters:
rctx - Request context to examine.
Returns:
Channel selected previously or by default, null if neither exist.
